duties_responsibilities.duty: Support managers with project coordination duties, work order cost estimating, billing, and developing project CPM schedules.
Assist with material procurement, project estimation, sourcing, and bidding of traffic signal and ITS projects.
Establish relationships with vendors, subcontractors, and suppliers and ensure compliance with bid documentation and insurance requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management/Engineering or relevant field (or at least 5 years of relevant experience)
